title: Did Members of the Migrant Caravan Paint a Swastika on an American Flag and Set It on Fire?
subtitle: A photograph of protesters in the Honduran capital setting fire to a U.S. flag inflamed some Americans.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Migrants traveling in a caravan from Central America to the U.S. drew a swastika on an American flag and set it on fire.
